channel.title: Paybycash
channel.description: I'm getting rs membership by paybycash sending cash through the mail and it says I need to give my address and phone number, will they call me or mail me anything because my parents don't Know I'm doing this.

item.title: Paybycash
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Pepper2 Dr_Pepper
item.description:
@Dr_Pepper2 wrote:

I send in my membership payments all the time through the mail. No, they will not call your phone they just need that incase there are issues with the payment. They will just contact you via E-mail to say your order was processed and confirmed. As for the address part, you have to have it as the return address on the envelope anyway so that is no big issue and they wont send any information too your house regarding the payment as I have paid membership for over 1 year with it and they have not sent me a single thing by Pay By Cash.

Read full topic

item.title: Paybycash
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

No. I have used paybycash for months. They do not call you or send mail to you. The only message you will get is in your email, which is from the paybycash company telling you your order is complete, pending, or started.

Read full topic

Because they are gonna bully him for playing runescape.

item.title: Paybycash
item.dc:creator: @Fishstix Fishstix
item.description:
@Fishstix wrote:

nohope:

I’m getting rs membership by paybycash sending cash through the mail and it says I need to give my address and phone number, will they call me or mail me anything because my parents don’t Know I’m doing this.

Most likely they are to call, but give them your cell phone number and state that you are 13+ (I’m not that sure if there is a age requirment for mailing…google it) Then just get a P.O. box if they need to mail anything, but why not just buy a ugc game card at your local 7-11, blockbuster, or rite aid?

www.ultimategamecard.com

If you want to fill out a few ads to get one for free www.prizerebel.com offers $10.00 and $20.00 card codes, they just email it to you when you claim your prize. Look into it a little.

Read full topic
